testSteps.description: Given User set the header "Content-Type" as "application/json"
When User set the request body as "createEmployee"

testSteps.description: Then User get status code as "200"
And User get "status" as "success" in response body
And User get "message" as "Successfully! Record has been added." in response body

children.description: Compare response: message, Successfully! Record has been added.
